index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Social and health Services, to provide financial assistance in addition to that authorized by Ordinance 102821 for Seattle-King County Nutrition project for the Elderly; increasing an object of expenditure in the 1974 Budget of the Department of Human Resources by reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
